meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Granoff David Gordy Chris McKillop Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1045.

td.p: Bill Granoff, a database administrator from Culver City, California
David Gordy, a law clerk from Woodland Hills, California
Chris McKillop, a management consultant from Toronto, Canada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $34,851)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "D"
WORLD GEOGRAPHY
POP MUSIC
SPORTS TRIVIA
DOLLS
NUMBER, PLEASE
